org.svvrl.goal.gui
Class AutomatonHighlighter

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.gui.AutomatonHighlighter

public class AutomatonHighlighter
extends java.lang.Object

This is a utility for temporarily highlighting some graphic components in an automaton by changing the color of the highlighted components and making other components more transparent. Don't forget to call the method reset() finally.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

Method Detail

setHighlight

public void setHighlight(java.util.Collection<?> objs,
                         java.awt.Color color)
Highlights a collection of objects by a specified color. The previously highlighted components will be un-highlighted first.

Parameters:
objs - graphic components in the automaton to be highlighted
color - the highlight color of objs

                         java.awt.Color color)
